summary: A slacker competes with a repeat winner for the "Employee of the Month" title at work, in order to gain the affections of a new female employee.
cast: Dane Cook|Jessica Simpson|Dax Shepard|Andy Dick|Tim Bagley|Brian George|Efren Ramirez|Marcello Thedford|Danny Woodburn|Harland Williams|Sean Whalen|Barbara Dodd|Victor Izay|Marc Mouchet|Kathleen Arc|John Hardman|Deryle J. Lujan|Adriana Cordova|Jenny Gabrielle|Emily Sandberg|Cece Renn|Taylor Warden|Susse Budde|Ann Kulich|Shirly Brener|Donna Cromer|Charmaine Rae|Alison Raimondi|William Sterchi|Tate Michael McDonald|Gina McDonald|Robin Timpanaro Lagrassa|James Blackburn|Jeremy Burnell|Dave Colon|Harp Corrigan|Scott Flick|Mark J. McRae|Rana Morrison|Fred Resler|Brian T Short
title: El empleado del mes
